author: prbuzz.com
title: Interval International To Sponsor Canadian Resort Conference
text:
Perspective Group today announced that Interval International, a prominent worldwide provider of vacation services and an operating business of Interval Leisure Group (Nasdaq: IILG), has confirmed its sponsorship of the 2015 Canadian Resort Conference (CRC).
The annual conference takes place, Sept. 9 – 10, at the luxurious Pan Pacific Vancouver hotel in British Columbia. It is produced and hosted by Perspective Group on behalf of Canada’s official timeshare industry trade body, the Canadian Resort Development Association (CRDA).
"We're delighted to be working with Jon and the Canadian Resort Development Association," said Bryan Ten Broek, Interval’s senior vice president of resort sales and marketing. "Interval appreciates the value that CRDA brings to the timeshare industry, and we look forward to participating in this year's conference.”
CRDA is dedicated to furthering the interests of the resort industry throughout Canada and worldwide. The trade association’s annual conference draws senior-level decision-makers from Canada, the United States, Mexico, the Caribbean and beyond. With interactive sessions and extended networking, CRC provides numerous opportunities for delegates to meet with international and domestic professionals and make valuable contacts with prospective new clients and strategic partners.
“ Interval International has been a driving force in the vacation ownership industry for nearly 40 years,” said Paul Mattimoe, president and CEO, Perspective Group. “Whether providing enhancing membership programs or delivering innovative point-of-sale technology and training support, Interval continues to add tremendous value for owners and the entire industry. We’re delighted to welcome this true industry leader as a sponsor of this year’s conference.”
CRC 2015 will feature Speed Networking and a Welcome Cocktail Reception on the first day and a full day of education sessions and networking opportunities on the second. Lively panel discussions and presentations by industry leaders will focus on new and emerging trends, the latest innovations, future growth of the Canadian resort marketplace and global industry challenges and opportunities, among other key topics.
Each year, CRC spotlights another premier Canadian destination. This year brings the conference to Vancouver, consistently recognized as one of the world’s most livable cities. This vibrant metropolis offers a range of cultural, historical and recreational attractions. Whether delegates prefer shopping in upscale boutique shops, dining on incredible cuisine or biking along an ocean wall, Vancouver provides the setting. Beaches offer scenic views and water sports, while the city’s cosmopolitan districts have eclectic shops, restaurants, galleries and museums.
Located on the downtown waterfront, the Pan Pacific Vancouver will put delegates close to leading attractions, including historic Gastown, Vancouver’s design, culture, food, fashion and nightlife hub. The elegant hotel boasts luxurious amenities and stunning views of the downtown skyline, the Coastal Mountains and the Vancouver Harbour.
To register and get additional information about CRC 2015, visit www.canadianresortconference.com .
For more information about the Canadian Resort Development Association, membership opportunities and events, visit www.crda.com .
About Interval International
Interval International operates membership programs for vacationers and provides value-added services to its developer clients worldwide. Based in Miami, Florida, the company has been a pioneer and innovator in serving the vacation ownership market since 1976. Today, Interval’s exchange network comprises more than 2,900 resorts in over 80 nations. Through offices in 16 countries, Interval offers high-quality products and benefits to resort clients and approximately 2 million families who are enrolled in various membership programs. Interval is an operating business of Interval Leisure Group, Inc. (Nasdaq: IILG), a leading global provider of non-traditional lodging, encompassing a portfolio of leisure businesses from exchange and vacation rental to vacation ownership.
About CRDA
CRDA is an industry-based association dedicated to furthering the vacation ownership resort and leisure industries. The association was founded over 30 years ago in response to the public’s demand for reliable information about timeshare products. Focus has since broadened to all aspects of shared ownership and the resort industry. For more information on membership and events, visit www.crda.com .
About Canadian Resort Conference
Canadian Resort Conference (CRC) is an annual event produced and hosted by Perspective Group, the vacation ownership industry’s leading PR & Multimedia Company globally. CRC attracts senior-level executives from Canada, the United States, Mexico, the Caribbean and beyond. It provides a crucial networking platform for those interested in entering the Canadian resort marketplace, and those who want to find strategic partnerships with other international companies. For more details visit www.canadianresortconference.com .
For more information about Perspective Group visit http://perspectivemagazine.com/.
